author: joshd4078
content:
As mentioned today, tomorrow will be the last office hours for project presentations. We have 10+ on the rosters, so we will be limiting the time for each presentation to 10 mins or less. If you are presenting tomorrow, please be succinct and efficient in your presentation. This office hours will also be 90 mins, going 30 mins after the hour.

For those that do not get to present, please record a video of yourself giving the project presentation and post it here for the group to see.

author: potuz
content:
> I think the reason you need an EL+CL combo running for MEV boost is that the CL client won‚Äôt start unless it has an EL client to connect to

The reason is that a validator needs to actually validate blocks. If everyone were to use a portal client on that system then flashbots would run Ethereum
